name: SEARCH ALL - ADULT
description:
SEARCH ALL - ADULT is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the male genitals on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The game location depicts a fantastic world with alien plants and buildings in the foreground. In the foreground of the game, a fantastic creature "Siren" is bathing in a pond. Between the foreground of the game and between the background of the game there are levitating islands, rockets in the form of male genitals, and a huge octopus on a levitating island. There are many planets rotating in the background of the game. In the upper right corner of the game there is a female planet.
The game, unlike the first part of the game, has an improved interface. Better picture quality. A lot of dynamic objects (animations) appeared in the game. Now the weight of the game is almost 10 times less than in the previous game, and the quality has become clearer and better!
Key Features:
- "Doodling" design style;
- 80 male genetalia to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack:
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result.
- The ability to zoom in / out of the camera to view more accurately.
- The game fully supports the gamepad! You can also move the cursor using the keyboard arrows!
